description: Main front-end source code for the Flutter-based Personal Finance Tracker application. Contains high-level widget definitions, navigation logic, and references to various service and widget modules. Implements UI themes, user authentication flow, dashboard overview, transaction management, budgets, and charts/analytics screens.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and initial route.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Manages user authentication state and navigation between login, register, and main dashboard.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main app shell with bottom navigation for Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, and Charts.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI for user login with input fields, login button, and transition to registration.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: UI for user registration with input validation, success/error messages, and navigation back to login.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions overview and quick access to add new transactions.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: List and manage transaction entries, including delete and navigation to edit.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Create or edit a transaction, with form validation and date picker.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Display categorized budget limits and current spent amounts.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Visual charts and analytics of spending by category.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Overrides StatelessWidget build method, returns the widget tree for each screen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state, fetches data, sets up listeners for various screens.

methods.name: _checkAuth
methods.description: Checks user's authentication status on startup in AuthNavigation.

methods.name: _handleLogin
methods.description: Handles login button press, calls AuthService.login, manages UI state.

methods.name: _handleRegister
methods.description: Handles registration submission, calls AuthService.register, updates UI.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Save transaction data to backend via TransactionService, handle create/update.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker dialog for transaction date selection.
